name: Screen Off

screenshots.caption: Using Screen Off you can switch off your monitor of your laptop / desktop while there is any long operation being done by the system.

short_description:
Sometimes, we just want to turn off the display of our laptop. Many laptops 
doesn't have this feature. We have to wait unitll the system turn off its display.
 
But now, copy Screen Off to your desktop. You dont need to install it. Just run it when ever
you want to turn off your monitor.

The screen will be resumed for a mouse click or a key board hit.
summary: Turn off your monitor ( laptop / desktop ) quickly with mouse click.
